metadata.title: CVE-2014-10073 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The create_response function in server/server.c in Psensor before 1.1.4allows Directory Traversal because it lacks a check for whether a file isunder the webserver directory.

criterions.comment: psensor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
